  3. More Brighton

    14.06.2011

    So yeah, as we expected, Brighton is ace. We spent most of our time there either shopping or eating.

    I've decided to post slightly bigger photos from now on. I'm hoping they'll distract from the fact that I'm not writing anything interesting.

  4. 158/365: Weird bug thing

    13.06.2011

    I found this bug hanging from a leaf. This was the best photo I got of it before it fell off, probably so it didn't have to have a weird man thing taking its picture any more. No idea what it is, though. It looks a bit like a caterpillar, but I'm pretty sure it's not. Anyone?
